â€¦ but with a little help from Metaâ€™s new SAM 3 model.

I uploaded a quick BTS video and SAM 3 locked onto my laptop, camera, mic, and monitor, tracking each one separately and automatically for me.

That means I can spotlight gear while Iâ€™m talking about it, blur the rest of the desk, then switch focus to another object without ever cutting the clip.

Normally this would take forever to do using traditional editing software, but SAM 3 makes it automatic.

You can try it now in the Segment Anything playground at segment-anything.com, and itâ€™s coming soon to Instagram Edits!
